name: Run, Run, Monsters!
description:
Plunge into the exciting world of puzzles, monsters and adventures!
You will visit many worlds and in each will overcome the challenges and dangers that it holds in itself to find and catch a monster for your own collection!
Run, Run, Monster! I will catch you!
In this platform, you need both dexterity and savvy, and exposure. Levels conceal the mysteries and traps that need to be overcome in order to obtain the coveted goal.
The gameplay will not make you tense from flying bullets and explosions, and if you are tired of everyday noisy games, then a relaxing platformer is what you need!

Features:
- A well-designed design of the world
- Fascinating gameplay
- Simple controls
